abilities.name: Flurry
abilities.description: Innate: After using an ability, Lee Sin's next 2 basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed, returning  20 / 30 / 40 (based on level) energy on the first attack and 「 half of that 」「  10 / 15 / 20 (based on level) energy 」 on the second.
descriptions: Innate: After using an ability, Lee Sin's next 2 basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed, returning  20 / 30 / 40 (based on level) energy on the first attack and 「 half of that 」「  10 / 15 / 20 (based on level) energy 」 on the second.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Active: Lee Sin fires a sonic blast in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it hits and  revealing them for 3 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Lee Sin fires a sonic blast in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it hits and  revealing them for 3 seconds.
If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast  Resonating Strike within the next 3 seconds at no delay.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Active: Lee Sin  dashes to the target allied unit's location. If the ally is a  champion, both they and Lee Sin are granted a  shield for 2 seconds upon his arrival and Safeguard's  cooldown is halved. Lee Sin can self-cast Safeguard to shield himself.
descriptions: Active: Lee Sin  dashes to the target allied unit's location. If the ally is a  champion, both they and Lee Sin are granted a  shield for 2 seconds upon his arrival and Safeguard's  cooldown is halved. Lee Sin can self-cast Safeguard to shield himself.
If Safeguard is used, Lee Sin can cast  Iron Will within the next 3 seconds at no delay.
If Safeguard's  dash interrupts  Resonating Strike,  Tempest and  Dragon's Rage may also be cast while dashing.

abilities.name: Tempest
abilities.description: Active: Lee Sin smashes the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  revealing them for 4 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Lee Sin smashes the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  revealing them for 4 seconds.
If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast  Cripple within the next 3 seconds after a 0.1-second delay.

abilities.name: Dragon's Rage
abilities.description: Active: Lee Sin  roots the target enemy champion during the cast time after which he roundhouse kicks them, dealing physical damage and  knocking them back 1200 units over 1 second.
levelings: Collision Damage:175 / 287.5 / 400 / 512.5 / 625 (+ 200% bonus AD) (+ 12 / 13.5 / 15 / 16.5 / 18% of kicked target's bonus health)
descriptions: Active: Lee Sin  roots the target enemy champion during the cast time after which he roundhouse kicks them, dealing physical damage and  knocking them back 1200 units over 1 second.
Enemies that collide with the displaced enemy receive bonus physical damage and are  knocked up for 1 second.

name: Lee Sin
title: the Blind Monk
blurb: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland...
